## ResourcePolicyBody.constants property

[Constants](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/policies/variables#constants) defined for use in conditions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constants?: Constants | undefined;
```

## Remarks

Requires the Cerbos policy decision point server to be at least v0.40.
